title: Implementing Insertion Sort in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore the implementation of the insertion sort algorithm in JavaScript. We will learn how to sort an array of numbers using this algorithm and understand the logic behind it. By the end of this lab, you will be able to use the insertion sort algorithm to efficiently sort arrays in your JavaScript projects.

meta.title: Mastering Insertion Sort in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to implement the efficient insertion sort algorithm in JavaScript and sort arrays effectively.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, sorting algorithms, array manipulation, javascript practice online, javascript lab, programming tutorials, javascript tutor, insertion sort

verify.name: Verify Student's Node Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 在JavaScript中实现插入排序
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何在JavaScript中实现插入排序算法。我们将学习如何使用该算法对数字数组进行排序，并理解其背后的逻辑。在本实验结束时，你将能够在你的JavaScript项目中使用插入排序算法有效地对数组进行排序。

meta.title: 精通JavaScript中的插入排序
meta.description: 学习如何在JavaScript中实现高效的插入排序算法并有效地对数组进行排序。
meta.keywords: JavaScript,JavaScript练习,排序算法,数组操作,在线JavaScript练习,JavaScript实验,编程教程,JavaScript导师,插入排序

verify.name: 验证学生对Node的使用
